newsitem.title: USA: Gantos Oct same store sales drop.
newsitem.headline: Gantos Oct same store sales drop.

text.p: Gantos Inc said Thursday net same-store sales for the four weeks ended November 2 were off six percent.
Net sales for that period also declined six percent to $12.7 million.
Net sales for the 39 weeks ended November 2 were $133.8 million, a decrease of two percent from the same period a year ago. Net same-store sales also declined two percent.
Adjusting net sales for the shift in the retail calendar, comparable-store sales for the five weeks ended November 2 dropped three percent, and same-store for the year-to-date fell three percent.
